name: Vla%C3%A7an_Umber
content:
Vlaçan Umber was a male Vindalian baron, art connoisseur, and the patron of the Caamasi light sculptor Ves Volette. He was one of the initial suspects in Volette's murder, but was exonerated. He became shocked when it was revealed by Jedi Knight Jax Pavan that Volette had been murdered by the Umber family's protocol droid, who only wished to heal the suffering of Umber's wife, Kirma.
Umber was a Vindalian noble, and generally kept to himself.
